metadata.name: twart
metadata.description:
We are in the extremely pleasant position to present the first NFT of contemporary music composition worldwide. The NFT is especially composed, performed, recorded and produced to be the first NFT of its category. A unique recording of "twart".
Composition: Panayiotis Kokoras https://www.panayiotiskokoras.com/
Animation: bestbefore-Andreas Karaoulanis http://bestbefore.gr/
Performed by dissonArt ensemble https://www.dissonart.gr/en/
Flute, Jannis Anissegos
Clarinet, Alexis Stavridis
Piano, Lenio Liatsou, 
Percussion, Kostas Argyropoulos
Violin, Theodor Patsalidis
Viola, Chara Seira
Violoncello, Vassilis Saitis
Contrabass, Yiannis Chatzis
Recorded in Polytropon recording studio
Sound engineer, Thanos Kazantzis
Legal support, Zoi Athanasiadou
Produced by dissonart ensemble
We are all greatly proud about it.
